name: Project: Deja vu
description:
Download the game to start your mythic adventure on Adelaland.
Lead your band of heroes into Death Cave to battle the forces of darkness! Don't hesitate, join us!

Game Features
Idle System and Plentiful Rewards
You (the lead Character) always explore the land for wealth even when you're ayway. When you online again, you can claim enough resources and EXP to become more stronger. Take a few minutes to have happiness and fun.

Evolving Strategy
Over 70+ heroes in different faction with unique skills. You should consider which heroes should be choosen to build your exclusive lineup. And train them wisely, no matter in the rune equipment or talent choosing. What's more, 6 formation for you to choose. Making full use of the formation advantages is beneficial to your battle.

Various Game Contents
It's rich in PVE and PVP gameplays. Challenge the main level to unlock unknown area. Sweep dungeons to get many resources. Climb the Abyss tower to prove your power.

Guild Wars
Fight alongside with your friends to conquer the opponent guild. Lead your guild to the summit of the guild war.

Worldwide Competition
Enjoy the Competition between worldwide players in Xserver battle and Tournament. Put forth your best lineup to fight for your glory in the Tournament. Watch they PK online and bet who will be the winner or loser.
